issues

browser navigation

  • Backwards navigation (using the browser history stack) has several issues.
    • note: The web standards community are working on improving the browser-history API, since many SPA's are running into the same issues.
  • Reloading complex-encoded URLs does not always work, due the mis-encoding of the URL parameters. This is a tricky issue, for which the causes which will need to be carefully studied, tested and fixed.

mobile browser compatibility and usability

  • Especially the iOS mobile browser needs more study and UX research (I do not own an iOS device, but can test on a cloud-accessible device browser).
  • Accessibility (and keyboard-access) should be evaluated by real usage and fixed where needed
  • Cold-startup time (upon first use) is quite slow (sometimes more than 10-20 seconds) on low-bandwidth networks and should probably be improved
